TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PrincipalPermission extends System.Object implements class System.Security.IPermission, class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PrincipalPermission Implements IPermission, IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PrincipalPermission sealed : System::Security::IPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 允许使用为声明和强制安全性操作定义的语言结构来检查活动用户（请参见 ）。

span.span: Allows checks against the active principal (see ) using the language constructs defined for both declarative and imperative security actions.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将标识信息 （用户名和角色） 传递到构造函数中，可用于要求活动主体的标识匹配此信息。By passing identity information (user name and role) to the constructor, can be used to demand that the identity of the active principal matches this information. 若要匹配活动和关联，指定的标识和角色必须匹配。To match the active and associated , both the specified identity and role must match. 如果`null`使用的标识字符串，它被解释为任何标识匹配的请求。If `null` identity string is used, it is interpreted as a request to match any identity. 利用`null`角色字符串将匹配任何角色。Use of `null` role string will match any role. 是通过默示、 传递`null`参数`name`或`role`到将匹配的标识和角色中任何。By implication, passing `null` parameter for `name` or `role` to will match the identity and roles in any . 还有可能构造，它仅确定是否表示经过身份验证或未经身份验证实体。It is also possible to construct a that only determines whether the represents an authenticated or unauthenticated entity. 在这种情况下，`name`和`role`将被忽略。In this case, `name` and `role` are ignored. 与大多数其他权限，不同不会扩展。Unlike most other permissions, does not extend . 它，但是，实现接口。It does, however, implement the interface. 这是因为不是代码访问权限; 也就是说，它未被授予基于正在执行的程序集的标识。This is because is not a code access permission; that is, it is not granted based on the identity of the executing assembly. 相反，它允许代码执行的操作 (， ， ，依次类推) 根据当前的用户标识以一致的方式的方式执行这些操作时代码访问以及代码标识权限。Instead, it allows code to perform actions (, , , and so on) against the current user identity in a manner consistent with the way those actions are performed for code access and code identity permissions. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在对主体权限的请求之前它是当前应用程序域的主体策略设置为枚举的值所需。Prior to a demand for principal permission it is necessary to set the current application domain's principal policy to the enumeration value . 默认情况下，主体的策略设置为。By default, the principal policy is set to . 如果你未设置为主体策略，对主体权限的请求将失败。If you do not set the principal policy to , a demand for principal permission will fail. 在要求主体权限前，应执行下面的代码：The following code should be executed before the principal permission is demanded: > > `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy(PrincipalPolicy.WindowsPrincipal).` ## Examples 下面的示例要求活动主体是管理员。The following example requires the active principal to be an administrator. `name`参数是`null`，从而使管理员能够满足该要求任何用户。The `name` parameter is `null`, which enables any user who is an administrator to pass the demand. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 要执行需要管理员身份的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that requires you to be an administrator, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. [!code-cpp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `None` 匹配仅未经身份验证的主体 (为空字符串 ("")，则没有，是`false`)。`None` matches only the unauthenticated principal ( is the empty string (""), no , is `false`). `Unrestricted` 匹配所有主体 (是`null`，是`null`)。`Unrestricted` matches all principals ( is `null`, is `null`). > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数包含针对与具有其他权限，设计的一致性，但并不十分有用的做法。This constructor is included for consistency with the design of other permissions, but is not useful in practice.

span.span: The parameter is not a valid .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这两个`name`参数和`role`参数必须与匹配的匹配活动的此权限和关联。Both the `name` parameter and the `role` parameter must match for this permission to match the active and associated . 设置`name`到`null`检查任何用户角色中。Set `name` to `null` to check for any user in a role. ## Examples 下面的示例要求活动主体是管理员。The following example requires the active principal to be an administrator. `name`参数是`null`，从而使管理员能够满足该要求任何用户。The `name` parameter is `null`, which enables any user who is an administrator to pass the demand. **请注意**中 Windows Vista、 用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。**Note** In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 要执行需要管理员身份的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that requires you to be an administrator, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. [!code-cpp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限表示的同一主体和标识。A copy of the permission represents the same principal and identity as the original permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed

summary.span: 在运行时确定当前主体是否与当前权限指定的主体相匹配。

span.span: Determines at run time whether the current principal matches the principal specified by the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有引发时，成功。If no is raised, succeeds. 此方法针对附加到调用线程的主体的作用。This method acts against the principal attached to the calling thread. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在调用之前方法，有必要将当前应用程序域的主体策略设置为枚举值。Prior to calling the method, it is necessary to set the current application domain's principal policy to the enumeration value . 默认情况下，主体的策略设置为。By default the principal policy is set to . 如果你未设置为主体策略，对主体权限的请求将失败。If you do not set the principal policy to , a demand for principal permission will fail. 主体权限的需求发生之前，应执行下面的代码：The following code should be executed before the demand for principal permission occurs: > > `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy(PrincipalPolicy.WindowsPrincipal).`

exception.span: 当前主体未通过当前权限指定的主体的安全检查。

span.span: The current principal does not pass the security check for the principal specified by the current permission.
-or-
The current is .

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

returns.span: 当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的权限的两个实例的哈希代码可能会有所不同，因此不应使用的哈希代码来比较两个对象。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

returns.span: 交集为空时，新权限将为 。

span.span: This new permission will be if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为两个用户永远不会相交，此方法不是用于。Because two users never intersect, this method is not useful for . 例如，应用于对象的For example, [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 等效于is equivalent to [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cpp/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cs/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/vb/remarks.vb#2)] 因为 Bob 和路易，同时可以代表任何标识。because no identity can simultaneously represent both Bob and Louise. 实际上，`pp1.Demand()`才会成功的未经身份验证的主体 (同名等于空字符串 ("")) 允许以充当管理员角色。In effect, `pp1.Demand()` only succeeds if an unauthenticated principal (with name equal to the empty string ("")) is allowed to act in the Administrator role.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且不是与当前权限属于相同类的实例。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果成功用于当前权限的所有要求也成功都完成指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if all demands that succeed for the current permission also succeed for the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的示例定义的实例对应于三个不同的用户。The following example defines instances of corresponding to three distinct users. 然后创建两个其他实例作为用户组。Two additional instances are then created as groups of users. `pp1` 表示 Bob 和路易，`pp2`表示 Bob、 路易和 Greg。`pp1` represents Bob and Louise, `pp2` represents Bob, Louise, and Greg. [!code-cpp[Classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 与前面的声明，`pp1.IsSubsetOf(pp2)`返回`true`，和`pp2.IsSubsetOf(pp1)`返回`false`。With the preceding declarations, `pp1.IsSubsetOf(pp2)` returns `true`, and `pp2.IsSubsetOf(pp1)` returns `false`.

exception.span: 参数是与当前权限属于不同类型的对象。

span.span: The parameter is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制匹配任何主体。An unrestricted matches any principal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: other
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个权限，表示给定的一组个人的条件对象。 creates a permission representing the criteria of a given set of individual objects. 它可用于简洁地表示一组条件，可测试。It is useful for compactly representing a set of conditions to test. 例如，与声明For example, with the declarations [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cpp/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cs/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/vb/remarks.vb#3)] `(ppBob.Union(ppLouise)).Demand()` 如果当前主体表示 Bob 中管理员角色的管理员或将 Louise 角色将会成功。`(ppBob.Union(ppLouise)).Demand()` will succeed if the current principal represents Bob in the role of Administrator or Louise in the role of Administrator.

exception.span: 参数是与当前权限属于不同类型的对象。

span.span: The parameter is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission.
